reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Advisory services to support Government of India to develop an IT based contract management system to accelerate investments in India's natural gas sector

description.narrative: To support the Government of India to implement global Exploration and Production best practice through efficient contract management. The programme aims to improve global investment attractiveness and ultimately increase the effectiveness of domestic oil and gas production.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
